attributes.action: Replace the road TAX as EU registered cars can not apply for it if not registered in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not possible to apply for road TAX for EU registered cars. There is no processes in place even if a car is legal in the county of origin. Why not to replace the road TAX with something more useful? As example, implement and share computer DB between all EU members? As part of EU the UK could benefit instead of loosing the money.
